## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description       | Type                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `isDot`  | `is-dot`  | Enable dot mode   | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `text`   | `text`    | The text of badge | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | The theme to use. | `string`              | `'primary'` |
